Employment Composition Signal

Employment composition signal: tracking shifts across key sectors and categories in the labour market.

As of 2025-12-10

Gemini Summary

State of the Market Summary:

  • The labor market's Employment Composition composite for September 2025 is NEUTRAL, with a smoothed z-score of -0.69 [Source: employment_composition_methodology].
  • This follows two months in the COOL regime (July, August 2025), indicating some recent moderation in slack.
  • Unemployment and employment-population ratio z-scores remain significantly negative, at -0.84 and -0.77 respectively, indicating slackness [Source: employment_composition_methodology].

Technical Summary:

  • The unsmoothed Employment Composition z-score of -0.66 for September 2025 is near the COOL regime threshold of -0.75.
  • A 3-month momentum for the unemployment rate shows an increase of 0.3, signalling rising joblessness over the recent period.
  • The persistent negative z-scores for employment metrics suggest underlying weakness, indicating potential for re-entry into a COOL regime.

References:

  • Labor Market Data (September 2025)
  • Employment Composition Methodology [Source: employment_composition_methodology].
  • The Employment_Composition_z and Employment_Regime datapoints most influenced conclusions.
  • JOLTS (Job Openings and Labor Turnover Survey) data for job openings and quits.
  • Unit Labor Cost (ULC) data for productivity-adjusted wage inflation insights.
**Self-healing** * **High-Value Inputs to Add** * Job Openings and Labor Turnover Survey (JOLTS) data [Source: Labor_Market_Turnover.html]: Provides insight into labor demand and worker confidence beyond unemployment rates. * Wage Growth Tracker (e.g., Atlanta Fed): Offers granular insights into wage inflation dynamics. * **Weaknesses in Provided Inputs** * The `dataframe` date range ends September 2025; more current data is needed for timely analysis. Fix: Provide data up to the most recent available month. * The methodology does not specify the maximum adaptive window size for robust z-scores within the main sections. Fix: Clarify the adaptive window parameters. * **Prompt Gaps or Issues** * The prompt requests listing RSS documents needed but provides no RSS feed content. Fix: Provide relevant RSS feed data when this section is required.
